title: Jiho Kim
text:
Hi there! I am a junior studying Computer Science at Calvin University. I am currently working as an undergraduate research assistant with Kenneth C. Arnold.
My research interests lie at the intersection of HCI and AI. I design, implement, and evaluate AI-powered systems that augment and empower human capabilities. I am currently researching UI affordances that facilitate human-AI collaboration without allowing AI to overstep human ingenuity and autonomy.

title: Jiho Kim
text:
Updates

March 18, 2024: I presented our workshop paper from summer research at HAI-GEN at ACM IUI in Greenville, SC.
November 4, 2023: I presented our poster from summer research at WMRUGS at Van Andel Institute in Grand Rapids, MI.
June 1, 2023: I started a working as an undergraduate summer researcher with Kenneth C. Arnold.
